resources.string: "Barbera is an online salon facility where you can get salon services at home. We provide salon services for both men and women at salon price. We at Barbera are committed to provide excellent quality services to our customers, who are the one who trusted in Barbera, who trusted in us. During this time, we are working to provide safe and sanitised services at your doorsteps."

" 1. When You Sign Up for Barbera, you agree to give us certain information voluntarily. This includes your Name, Phone Number,email address and residential address.

2. This data is only used for Service Booking Purposes.

3. We don't import any other kind of hidden data from your device, neither do we require any external permissions to run Barbera app.

4. You can continue without signing up, and can see our service catalogue. But to book a service, you need to sign up.

5. Your data is completely safe with us. We don't use your credentials for any monetary/advertisement purposes. Barbera app is completely ad free.

"
"Refer your freinds and invite them to Barbera App using your invite link. On their successful sign up, you will get an essential service for up to 100% off"

1st Sitting
Facial(Kaya), Threading, Hair Massage

Facial(Kaya), Threading, Hair Massage

Facial(Kaya), Threading, Hair Massage

Makeup, Lehenga Drape, Body Wax(Rica), Hair Spa, Hair Cut, BOdy Spa(Loreal), Manicure, Pedicure, Threading, Hairwash, Facial(Kaya)
